title: Ep 29 | The Balance of Justice, Mercy, and Climate Change
description:
The guys discuss climate change and how the "Cute Marxist" plans to stop it. Jase questions why cows flatulence will destroy us, and Al leads the discussion of Judges and the balance of justice and mercy. 

 

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX

 

See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1

 

To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
